sentences: Ta töötab energiaettevõttes energiat tootva seadme operaatorina.
Energia hinnad tõusid ja nüüd maksab energia rohkem kui enne.
context: The word energiat is the plural form of the Estonian word energia, which refers to energy as a physical or mental force. It can be used in various contexts such as physics, where it describes the ability to do work, or in everyday life, where it refers to the vitality or vigor of a person.
